data.text: @americanwombat Give me the chance to prove you wrong in a public structured conversion about our different viewpoints
@LiteDoctor @americanwombat Was coming here to say almost the same thing! 👌🏽
@americanwombat Pitt obviously won, because at the end he didn't have to live with Julia Roberts' annoying character.

@americanwombat i live by the truth that is "never argue with a fool, onlookers won't be able to tell the difference". There is no winning- only the impression you will leave on those who are on the fence.
